name: Astro-Miners Demo
description:
This is the free DEMO VERSION of the game that launches you into outer space to collect precious resources from asteroids!

Play through a small sample of the 20 different mission levels that come with the paid version at http://popmachine.itch.io/astro-miners

We are thrilled to be partnering with the Royal Ontario Museum to bring this exciting, educational title to kids of all ages. A portion of the proceeds from each sale goes to benefit the ROM.

Suit up, ASTRO MINERS!
